attributes.action: speak to the Chancellor and Treasury Department to increase the Inland Revenue Mileage Rates for people providing their own vehicle for business purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These rates have remained the same for over a decade and since the New Labour Government were first elected.  The stagnation of these rates is now having an adverse affect upon the economic well being of people supplying their own vehicle for business purposes.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "speak to the Chancellor and Treasury Department to increase the Inland Revenue Mileage Rates for people providing their own vehicle for business purposes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15393.asp
